Subskills.name: Horde of Rats
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile amount of plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Gnawing Rodents
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Ratsunami
Subskills.description: Summon increased amount of piercing rats bouncing off of high terrain.

Subskills.name: Lab Grown Rats
Subskills.description: Increases the size of plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Bite Tethering
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Plague Carriers
Subskills.description: Chance for rats to explode into plagued chunks of meat dealing damage and inflicting poisoned on hit.

Subskills.name: Painful Bite
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit with increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Rodent Handler
Subskills.description: Increases cast rate when using plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Ratpocalypse
Subskills.description: Summon increased amount of rats in a circle around target location moving towards the center. Plague of rats now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Leptospirosis
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Nimble Trainer
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Plaguemausers
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of plague of rats.

Subskills.name: Rat Den
Subskills.description: Summon a rat den at target location constantly sending rats towards nearby monsters. Plague of rats now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Spreading Infestation
Subskills.description: Increases the proc chance and poisoned damage of plague carriers. Plague carriers now additionally sends multiple piercing rats towards nearby monsters.
